description.narrative: Phoenix Commodities Pvt. Ltd. (Phoenix or the Sponsor), established in 2001, is a global agri-food, farming, distribution and resources group engaged in the production, procurement, processing, merchanting and distribution through its integrated supply chain. With physical presence in over 24 countries across Asia, Africa, Europe, Australia and the Commonwealth of Independent States, the company employs over 2,500 people. The proposed loan will support Phoenixs value expansion strategy and finance establishment of a greenfield fruit orchard in Kazakhstan (the Project).

The most significant expected development impacts include: (i) direct and indirect job creation, with strong contribution to female employment; (ii) provision of affordable and nutritionally rich products to domestic and regional consumers; and (iii) development of the fruit value chain for Kazakhstan through demonstration and replication effect on other sector players. Improving yields at the orchards and putting in place processing and storage capacities will contribute to value chain strengthening over time and position the country as potential net exporter of fruit. The Project will also set an example for appropriate E&S and sustainability practices to enable export market access and withstand climate shocks.
